title: "Neural Net Art"
content:
Welcome to our website, where we showcase art inspired by neural networks! Our collection features a variety of pieces created using machine learning algorithms and techniques. From abstract compositions to realistic renderings, our artists use neural networks as a tool for generating unique and captivating artwork.

Our wallpaper, featuring a simple graphic of a neural network against a background of complementary colors, is just a small taste of the kind of art you can expect to find on our site. Whether you're a fan of digital art or simply curious about the intersection of technology and creativity, we hope you'll enjoy exploring our collection.

Check back often, as we're always adding new pieces to our gallery. And if you're an artist working with neural networks, we'd love to hear from you! Contact us to submit your work for consideration in our collection.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a neural network, against a background of complementary colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
